payload.message: Generate insights about AI assistant evolution from reactive tools to proactive partners. Focus on deep thinking about memory systems, feedback loops, and AI-AI collaboration. Post summary to designated channel.

Execute research phase: Search for latest developments in AI memory systems, SQLite optimization techniques, and autonomous thinking loops. Focus on practical implementations and recent research papers. Summarize findings with actionable insights.

Execute action phase: Based on yesterday's thinking insights and today's research findings, implement one actionable improvement to the SQLite memory system. Options: 1) SQLite optimization, 2) New memory integration feature, 3) Documentation update, 4) GitHub repository enhancement. Focus on concrete implementation using the memory_writer.py and memory_query.py tools.

Execute integration phase: Integrate insights from today's thinking (4am), research (5am), and action (6am) phases into the SQLite memory system. Use the sqlite_memory_integrator.py tool to add new insights to the database. Update memory chunks with new insights and ensure proper indexing.
Daily SQLite backup example: Create a backup of the SQLite database and optionally push to GitHub. This demonstrates database maintenance and version control integration for the memory system.
